content: Be sure to turn around from the Shrine and look back toward the main gate, and you should spot a **Treasure Chest** to the right in front of an altar.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Be sure to turn around from the Shrine and look back toward the main gate, and you should spot a **Treasure Chest** to the right in front of an altar.
